1.0.name: wordpress/nmedia-sticky-headerfooter-plugin
1.0.description:
This plugin lets you put sticky header or footer in your website. It can be used to display News Alert, New Features etc on top of your site or at the bottom.

Features
  1. Type Custome Message
  2. HTML supported
  3. Custom Background Color
  4. Custom Border Color
  5. Font Color
  6. Font Size
  7. Switch b/w Header and Footer

Demo can be seen on company website. You will see sticky footer or header on pages. View Demo
